price: Ibiremwa bizokwicisha bugufi kuri Nyenubugingo budashira nk’uko buyikwiye, Umuhagarikizi w’ibiremwa Yikwije muri vyose. Ni ukuri kuri uwo musi, uwiremetse irenganya ry’ibangikanyamana azohahombera koko.
arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا

meta.transliteration: waʿanati al-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi al-qayūmi waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man
